reuters.title: Bell Resources says it buys 57.6 mln BHP shares, taking holding to 29.93 pct
reuters.body: Israeli jets bombed Palestinian targets in south Lebanon for the second time in four days, Lebanese security sources said. They said the planes attacked targets in the Darb al-Sim area a few kms east of Sidon. Israeli planes carried out a similar raid in the same area on Friday, hitting two buildings used by guerrillas loyal to Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat. REUTER 
